affirmations.body: All my body systems function perfectly.
Every part of my body is healthy and full of energy.
I enjoy strengthening my body with exercise. exercise regularly, breathe deeply, and feed my body only nutritious food.
I feel better and better every day as my body heals.
I pay attention and listen to what my body tells me it needs to be healthy and vital.
I sleep soundly each night, awaking rested and full of energy.
